Interface SaleHistoryItem

public interface SaleHistoryItem
Projection interface for representing sales history data. Used to retrieve aggregated sales statistics such as hourly order counts and revenue.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getHour()
    Gets the hour of the day for the sales data.
    int
    getOrders()
    Gets the total number of orders placed during the specified hour.
    double
    getRevenue()
    Gets the total revenue generated during the specified hour.

  • Method Details

    • getHour

      int getHour()
      Gets the hour of the day for the sales data.
      Returns:
      The hour (0-23) as an integer, representing the time of day.

    • getOrders

      int getOrders()
      Gets the total number of orders placed during the specified hour.
      Returns:
      The number of orders as an integer.

    • getRevenue

      double getRevenue()
      Gets the total revenue generated during the specified hour.
      Returns:
      The total revenue as a double.
